description: Automate Twitter interactions by posting tweets, replying, and searching tweets with structured results. Maintain persistent browser sessions to preserve login state and avoid repeated authentications. Manage browser context IDs for seamless session continuity across requests.

contextId.description: Browserbase context ID for persistent sessions to maintain login state (falls back to env BROWSERBASE_CONTEXT_ID)

openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API key for AI actions (falls back to env OPENAI_API_KEY)

browserbaseApiKey.description: Browserbase API key (falls back to env BROWSERBASE_API_KEY)

browserbaseProjectId.description: Browserbase project ID (falls back to env BROWSERBASE_PROJECT_ID)

capabilities.name: get_context_id
capabilities.description: Get the current Browserbase context ID for persistent sessions

capabilities.name: set_context_id
capabilities.description: Set the context ID for persistent sessions
